body: This is a FULL TIME job - 8h/day.Job responsibilities: Increase customers’ satisfaction by solving additional requests of service - outbound calls ;Offer complete support to the customers we approach through the NPS( Net Promoter Score) Close the Loop calls - Make sure the customers' suggestions are delivered to the responsible departments;Provide proactive services related to the customers’ needs regarding payments of the insurance policies (Direct Debit, unallocated amounts) – with the purpose to prevent and reduce their effort on the process;Perform customers’ retention for insurance contracts by: identifying their current needs and propose possible solutions, reminding details regarding the protection and investment components and also reinforcing the insurance’s benefits;Surprise customers by performing greeting calls in specific holiday periods and also by sending them unexpected customised symbolic presents, in different special moments of their life (Random Acts of Kindness);Offer dedicated support for the special sales force levels (NN Partners) ;Get involved in projects related to the products and services provided to the customers and also in different campaigns that require our expertise as front office specialists (sales, marketing campaigns).Job requirements: - Previous experience in customer related areas (sales, marketing, call center); - University degree;- PC Skills MS Office (Excel, Access, Power Point, Outlook).Competency requirements: - Flexible, can do attitude, positive attitude - Collaboration skills - Team work- Customer oriented attitude- Ability to solve problems independently - Communication skills (both written and oral, phone skills) - Negotiations skills
title: Customer Care - Retail Officer
locations: Costache negr, București, Municipiul București, România
